description.label: Description
description.value: This small axe can be used in close combat or thrown.

description.label: Description
description.value: Little more than a leather cup attached to a pair of straps, a sling can be used to fling smooth stones or sling bullets at a range.

description.label: Description
description.value: These are small metal balls, typically either iron or lead, designed to be used as ammunition in slings.

description.label: Description
description.value: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.
When the bandit rolls initiative using Deception or Stealth, they can attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Demoralize]{Demoralize} one creature as a free action.
The bandit ignores the effects of non-magical difficult terrain in forests.
